name: Blue Bards: Congo Cardboard
description:
Welcome to Congo, the world's biggest online retailer. Here at Congo, we pride ourselves on speed and fast shipment, that's why we are the most popular and dominant ecommerce site on the ENTIRE INTERNET!!!!!! MUHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!  .......................... However, sometimes we mess up and can't let our customers know, otherwise  we would lose all our business. That's why you *employee number 456* have been hired today. Order lots of packages and go through them all to find the item that wasn't supposed to be sent out. Upgrade your delivery tier through our company to unlock higher and higher prestige packages. Now go out there and make the company proud!*

*Complete your contractually obligated requirements.

Recommended to play in full screen.

All art was completed by the team

Sound clips and music was licensed by Storyblocks.com

Font type was publicly available from Amazon.com
